languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
The servo-skull swarm becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies in a 4-cell radius. Whenever it is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, incoming damage is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} and its armour is increased by +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

languages.original_text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.
Он становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для врагов в радиусе 4 клеток. Когда рой получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, его получаемый урон уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Суммируется и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

The servo-skull swarm becomes the priority target for enemies in a 4-cell radius. Whenever it is hit, its incoming damage is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Stacks and lasts until the end of round.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği, +%{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazanır.
Hizmelet sürüsü, 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar için {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedef{/g} hâline gelir. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vurulduğunda{/g} gelen hasar {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar azalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri de +%{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} kadar artar. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Hizmelet sürüsü, 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar için {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedef{/g} hâline gelir. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vurulduğunda{/g} gelen hasar {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar azalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değeri de +%{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} kadar artar. Hizmelet sürüsü +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği, %{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değer kazanır.
Hizmelet sürüsü, 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar için {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedef{/g} hâline gelir. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vurulduğunda{/g} gelen hasar {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} kadar azalır. Etkisi {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.
El enjambre de servocráneos se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de todos los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas. Cada vez que recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g}, el daño sufrido se reduce en −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} aumenta un +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} %. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

El enjambre de servocráneos se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de todos los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas. Cada vez que recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g}, el daño sufrido se reduce en −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高15点，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}点。
伺服头骨集群会成为距离4格以内所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。每当伺服头骨集群被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，后续承受的所有伤害都会降低{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点，且伺服头骨集群{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%。此效果可叠加，持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。

languages.text:
Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm wird das {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} für Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern. Wird er {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, wird der erlittene Schaden um −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} reduziert und seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} erhöht sich um +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} %. Dauert bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an. Stapelbar.

traits.locale_text:
Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}.

Wird er {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, wird der erlittene Schaden um −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} reduziert und seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} erhöht sich um +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} %. Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm wird für Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}. Wird er {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, wird jeder erlittene Schaden um −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} verringert. Hält bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} an. Stapelbar.

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +15, de +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et de +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g}.
L'essaim de servocrânes devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases. Chaque fois qu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g}, les dégâts qu'il subit sont réduits de -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} est augmentée de +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} %. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.

Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +15, de +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et de +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g}.
L'essaim de servocrânes devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases. Chaque fois qu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g}, les dégâts qu'il subit sont réduits de -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} est augmentée de +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} %. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.

L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +15, de +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et de +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g}.
L'essaim de servocrânes devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases. Chaque fois qu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g}, les dégâts qu'il subit sont réduits de -{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Dure jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+15され、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が+{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}される。
サーヴォスカル・スウォームは、半径4セルの敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されるたびに、受けるダメージが−{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}低下し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%増加する。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}終了まで継続する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
The servo-skull swarm becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies in a 4-cell radius. Whenever it is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, incoming damage is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} and its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}, +{uip|Dodge|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +{uip|Deflection|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.
Он становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для врагов в радиусе 4 клеток. Когда рой получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, его входящий урон уменьшается на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}, а {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%. Суммируется и длится до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

Whenever it is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, incoming damage is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} and its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +{uip|Armour|20f00bda7d544f34b361e3015afdde4a}%.
